summary: PASSENGER AIRBAG NOT ACTIVE WHEN A PASSENGER IS SEATED. SOMETIMES IT COMES "ON" ON HIS OWN WHILE DRIVING.  ALSO THE DASHBOARD MELT WHEN THE CAR IS PARKED UNDER THE SUN. ESPECIALLY HERE IN TEXAS WITH HIGH TEMPERATURE. DASHBOARD CRACKING WITH HIGH TEMPERATURE. TOYOTA AND MAZDA FIX THIS FOR FREE FOR THEIR CUSTOMER BUT INFINITI WANNA CHARGES US FOR THAT.
